Name: Airfield
Description: Balloon :balloon: action may be used to transport 3 Resources from one player to any other player.

Name: Cleansing Wind
Description: Balloon :balloon: may be used to remove a Debuff from any player

Name: Balloon Rides
Description: Balloon :balloon: may be used to transport 2 Meeples from one player to another.

Name: Wizard Tower
Description: When you cast a spell, you may spend some stacks on top and some on bottom.

Name: Logistics
Description: Apply Continue to all buffs you gain

Name: Architecture
Description: When you play this card, play a previously unplayed Neighborhood card from the box. This card cannot be replaced.

Name: Prediction
Description: When any player draws a Spell, they may draw an extra spell card. If they do, discard a Spell.

Name: Flint
Description: If you have :stone: and no :fire:, you may gain a :fire:

Name: Casino Owner
Description: At each Overnight  :gamble:, you may reroll a single die once before taking a bonus. (All players still use the new total.)

Name: Eternal Flame
Description: If you have :fire:, you may give yourself Burning :burning: If you have :burning:, you may apply Potent :potent: to your current spell.

Name: Elite Recon
Description: When you :scout:, you may reveal the next face-down enemy, instead of only the top card.

Name: Guerilla Tactics
Description: When you :scout: an enemy, you may place Confusion :confusion: on them.

Name: Containment Tactics
Description: When you :scout: an enemy, you may place Rooted :rooted: on the Army.

Name: Roads
Description: You may spend :stone: :stone: to cycle everyone’s spells in the middle of Player phase.

Name: Traps
Description: You may tap this card to prevent a Steal from any player. For :stone: :stone: this card may be untapped.

Name: Training
Description: Once per round, you may pay :stone: :stone: for any player to gain :strong:

Name: Water Tower
Description: You may tap this card to gain :water: equal to your  :water-income:. You may remove a Strong :strong: buff, and if you do you may untap this card.

Name: Extinguishers
Description: You may spend :water: :water: to remove Burning from any player.

Name: Irrigation
Description: During Overnight, you may pay any amount of :water: for another player’s Grow action.

Name: Hydraulics
Description: When you Dig :dig:, you may spend a :water: to :dig: a second time.
